description: A bath complex (IX, 4, 5-18) located at the intersection of the Via Stabiana and Via di Nola that was built following the earthquake of AD 62.

history.comment: Reimported full way geometry and updated provenance
improved OSM location (underlying data for previously published location now deprecated)
